I’m Chidera Orizu, a Bioinformatics and Data Science student at Brigham Young University–Idaho with experience in Python, R, and SQL. I enjoy using computational tools to analyze biological data, build predictive models, and automate workflows. With hands-on experience as a Data Analyst and Teaching Assistant, I’m passionate about applying data-driven approaches to advance healthcare, biotechnology, and genomics research.
